Articles.Content:
Calling 911 to ask if you can eat enough simple carbohydrates to make them into a complex carbohydrate.

(Operator: "No, you can't make healthier snacks by eating more of them."
To get the movie session times.
Calling 911 to ask if this is an electron year.
To get maths tutoring.

To get a recipe for frito pie

113710192023

Calling 911 because I saw 2 people go into a house, then 3 people leave, and I want to know the state of the house if it needs 1 people to enter it for it to become empty.

(Operator: "Please...just...take a break from your math.")
To say the phone network is down.
To say you see a witch in the sky.
Calling 911 because you want a hug.
Calling 911 with no specific reason.
Calling 911 because you require additional pylons.
Calling 911 on aerobraking to inform them that the air is broken.

Calling 911 because you want another visit to The Texas Renaissance Festival

145811122023
Calling 911 to tell about foreign spies at The Texas Reconnaissance Feastival.
Calling 911 because nobody understands me when I talk about the inherent superiority of Z gauge over HO gauge.
Calling 911 because anti-HO-Z-gaugerians are detected in the Solar System proximity.

Operator: 911 whats your emergency?

caller: yes i ordered a 12 ct nugget with bbq sauce and they gave me a 12 ct nugget with honey mustard.

224211152023

Calling 911 because my computer told me, "This program has performed an illegal operation and must be shut down."

(Operator: "Stupid Windows 95 crashes.")
Calling 911 because that's the Way.

Calling 911 because you want to know how to avoid clipping into the Backrooms.

(Operator: "Just...don't try to break reality or force yourself through objects. It's not hard.")

Because noone gave the kitties on floor 4485 no attention and not giving kitties scritches, rubs and pats is 100% illegal!

131211192023
Hello, 911?  Yes, I'd like to report a crime in progress.  @AlamoVampire has mentioned cats in multiple threads on the forum today.

Calling 911 because @Scarecrow71 hasnt mentioned cats enough!

213711192023
Calling 911 because the moon is haunted.
Banned because the moon is invented for haunting, werewolving, and other tricks.
